quotes.quote: Good day.
You have no business here, this factory is top secret!
Don't touch those buttons!
Hey, you, don't touch our kitchen!

Noble stranger, we will open the Door of the Sacred Carrot for you if you sabotage the mutant factory, from where the monsters that infest this hemisphere emerge. This door leads to the shore, and from there you can access all of this part of the planet.
The passage that I'm opening for you leads to a port, where the old subway that crossed the Hamalayi used to leave from.
Hey, you! Don't touch our k... oh, it's you! @ Good work, you have disabled the mutant factory! No more new monsters are being produced. By the way, what is your name, brave stranger?
No more gas.
Greetings! Our village is harassed by the mutants. But these monsters are not a result of the climate - they are produced in a nearby factory built by FunFrock.
This is not really a good time!
Thanks for your help. And, whatever you do, destroy the eggs if you are going in the factory! If you don't, new monsters will be produced and will come and attack the village.
I don't know what that could be all about.
Good day.
New monsters are still coming to the village: the factory has not been completely disabled!
And now, brave stranger Twinsen, follow me to the Door of the Sacred Carrot.
Twinsen
Thank you for saving this village, brave stranger Twinsen.
I don't know what that could be all about, brave stranger Twinsen.
It's so much calmer since you've come, do you really have to leave?
I'd like so much to help you, Twinsen.
Help!
Whew, safe!
Carrot, open up!
I'm looking for the plans for the Teleportation Center.
Did you know that there is a Clear Water lake very near here. It is located close to the Door of the Sacred Carrot and it has a close connection with a prophecy.
You will have to interrogate traffickers, people that are in this hemisphere in any case.
Where do you want to go?
To Tippett island.
To Fortress island.
To Brundle island.
I'm staying here.
Where do you want do go, Twinsen?
Ah, it's impossible to open without a blue card.
To the rabbibunny village.
To the mutant factory.
Leave me alone! I've got work to do, and no time to play!
Use your red card to use the skilift.
Sorry, I don't know where they are.
I don't know where they are.
